com.Netzwerk.de

Class SecureController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Netzwerk.de.SecureController

  • public class SecureController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describe a object which handle security things like

    - generation of hash from a password
    - generate of a salt
    - decryption and encryption of messages
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Pascal Sch√§fer
